thread.title: Cash to spare? Preorder your 24-karat gold iPhone 6S now
thread.title_full: Cash to spare? Preorder your 24-karat gold iPhone 6S now - CNET

author: Anthony Domanico
title: Cash to spare? Preorder your 24-karat gold iPhone 6S now
text:
Enlarge Image Legend
Want a blinged-out iPhone 6S but can't quite afford the $200,000 Luxe model that Brikk announced last month? Finnish company Legend wants to send you a gold, diamond-encrusted iPhone 6S or 6S Plus for as little as $3,300 (about £2,150, AU $4,700).
The company has begun taking preorders for two iPhone 6S models -- the Classique and the Momentum -- both of which come complete with 24-karat gold, rose gold, platinum or black rhodium casing. The Classique adds a diamond-studded Apple logo, while the Momentum differentiates itself with a custom engraving.
Both models come in the 128GB option for either the iPhone 6S or 6S Plus, and will begin shipping in October worldwide.
Related Links Preorder your diamond-encrusted Apple iPhone 6S now The Classique starts at €2,950 ($3,300, £2,150, AU$4,700), and the Momentum retails for €3,790 (US $4,200, £2,800, AU$6,000). Each model can be customized to add extras like diamond-studded bezels and buttons for an additional price if you're feeling extra luxurious.
If you're interested in blinging out your iPhone 6S, you can put your kids' college funds on hold and head over to the Legend preorder page . If your budget is a bit more modest, you'll have to wait until Apple announces the preorder date and price point for the iPhone 6S and 6S Plus , which is expected to occur at the company's event on Wednesday .
Be sure to follow along as CNET live-blogs the September 9 Apple event starting at 10 a.m. PT. CNET's live pre-show starts at 9 a.m. PT.
